name: CreateTenantBasedHandle
description:
Create a tenant-based handle in Datadog for Teams.

Use this tool to create a new tenant-based handle for the Microsoft Teams integration within Datadog. It should be called when you need to configure or add a handle specific to a tenant in Datadog's Microsoft Teams integration.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: ID of the Microsoft Teams channel to associate with the tenant-based handle.

parameters.name: handle_name
parameters.description: The name for the tenant-based handle you wish to create in the Datadog Microsoft Teams integration.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Microsoft Teams team to associate with the Datadog handle.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the tenant in the Datadog Microsoft Teams integration.

value_schema.description: Specifies the tenant-based handle resource type.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: Specifies the tenant-based handle resource type.

value_schema.description: Specifies the tenant-based handle resource type.
